backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining access control, storage mixins, stable state, and CRUD endpoints for history, membership, media-backed sections, branding, and clubs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that converts old stable types to new ones by adding media fields and initializing branding and media values to null.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file, including pages, components, hooks, and layouts.
frontend/docs/android-apk-from-pwa.md: Documentation explaining how to convert the deployed PWA into an Android APK using Bubblewrap and Trusted Web Activity.
frontend/docs/production-deploy-google-s: Guide outlining production deployment steps and Google Search Console verification for version 10.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions with OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML template containing SEO tags, PWA metadata, icons, and bootstrapping for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web App Manifest defining PWA metadata, theme colors, icons, categories, and display mode.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots configuration allowing crawlers while blocking admin routes and pointing to the sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing key public routes with update frequency and priority values.
frontend/public/sw.js: Implements a PWA service worker that caches static assets, cleans old caches, and serves network-first responses with offline fallbacks.
frontend/scripts/verify-gsc-meta.ts: Checks the built dist/index.html for a required Google Search Console meta tag and exits with an error if missing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the React router structure for all public and admin routes using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/admin/MediaPicke: Allows admins to upload, validate, preview, and remove image or video media with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Protects admin pages by redirecting non-admin users to the login page and showing an access denied message.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, quick links, and dynamically loaded social media icons.
frontend/src/components/InstallPromptBan: Displays a PWA install banner when installable, allowing users to install or dismiss the prompt.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Renders the responsive top navigation bar with dynamic branding and admin-aware links.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Provides branding utilities including a fallback logo path and a function to resolve the active logo URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using Internet Identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Provides a persisted Zustand store for simple admin login using fixed credentials and session-based storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context that loads, manages, and exposes user identities and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Handles PWA installation prompts, tracking installability, installed state, and dismissed prompts via session storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on backend data such as branding, history content, memberships, and clubs using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS and theme variables for light and dark modes, including color palettes and base typography.
frontend/src/layouts/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component that renders a top nav, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page describing the organization’s story, mission, vision, and values with styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAboutPage.tsx: Provides an admin UI to edit, add, and remove About sections with text, optional links, and media, using fetch and update mutations.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBrandingPage.tsx: Allows admins to update the organization’s branding, mainly the logo, with save and feedback states.
frontend/src/pages/AdminClubsManagerPage: Enables admins to create, edit, and delete clubs with detailed form fields and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Displays admin tools and navigation links for managing branding, home content, about content, and more.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHistoryEditorPag: Lets admins edit the organization’s history text and media, with loading, saving, and success feedback.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHomePageEditorPa: Provides an admin interface to view, edit, add, and remove home page sections and save updates via API mutations.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Renders the admin login form handling authentication, error display, and redirecting on successful login.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMembershipReview: Displays and manages a list of membership registration submissions with loading and error states.
Allows admins to load, edit, and save social media link URLs with success and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ClubDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays detailed information for a single club with loading, error, and not‑found fallbacks.
frontend/src/pages/ClubsPage.tsx: Displays a list of clubs with loading, error, and empty states, linking to individual club pages.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows various contact methods including email, phone, address, and office hours using card components.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Renders a list of predefined upcoming events with details, badges, and styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Fetches and displays organizational history content with loading, error, and optional media handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with hero content, dynamic sections from backend, and fallback defaults.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipRegistratio: Provides a membership registration form with submission handling and a confirmation state.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Renders a programs listing page with cards showing program details, icons, ages, and schedules plus a call‑to‑action section.
frontend/src/utils/media.ts: Provides media file validation, type checks, conversion to Uint8Array, and preview URL helpers for images and videos.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Utility functions to update canonical and Open Graph URL meta tags based on the current route.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, radii, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Captures current project scope, architecture notes, issues, and feature inventory for build planning and tracking.
